Text:
Sorry, forgot to include this in the description! For the 'Messenger - Basic+Password' file, you must edit the password before you use it! Right click the file, click edit, now notepad should open. Find where it says 'YOUR USERNAME', erase that, and insert your own (The quote marks must stay [ex. 'F.S.F.Y.']).

Thanks,
F.S.F.Y.
